application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area North West London
description: Submission of details pursuant to Condition 1.8 (Temporary Works), 1.27A (Drainage concept works), 5.1 (Primary Development Delivery Programme), 5.2 (Detailed Delivery Programme), 6.1 (Binding of the land), 6.2 (Binding of the land), 33.1 (Existing Water Supply), 33.2 (Water Use Principles), 43.1 (Archaeological Scheme of Investigation), 44.7 (Water levels monitoring) and 44.10 (Water Framework Directive Assessment) in relation to the Claremont Road Junction with Tilling Road within Phase 1A (North) (Infrastructure 1) Sub-Phase of planning permission F/04687/13 dated 23/07/2014 for the comprehensive redevelopment of Brent Cross Cricklewood
